meanings.definition: The last day of the year; New Year's Eve.
meanings.sent1: On hogmanay, people gather to welcome the new year.
meanings.sent2: We always have a big feast on hogmanay to celebrate.
meanings.sent3: The hogmanay party was so lively that it lasted until dawn.
meanings.sent4: As the clock struck midnight on hogmanay, the fireworks lit up the sky.
meanings.sent5: The atmosphere on hogmanay is filled with excitement and anticipation.

meanings.definition: A celebration or party held on New Year's Eve.
meanings.sent1: Let's organize a hogmanay with music and dancing.
meanings.sent2: The hogmanay at their house is always the highlight of the year.
meanings.sent3: The hogmanay decorations were so colorful and festive.
meanings.sent4: The hogmanay countdown is a tradition we never miss.
meanings.sent5: Everyone looks forward to the hogmanay festivities each year.
